channel.title: [MaxCraft 1.6.2] CRACKED 24/7 SERVER,NO HAMACHI, LOCATION: FRANCE
channel.description:
[img]http://web.maxcraft.biz/images/logo.png[/img] [size=2]MaxCraft 1.6.2 CRACKED 24/7 Server[/size]
[url=http://web.maxcraft.biz]Server Website[/url]
SERVER VIDEO: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0N4RP0Z4TwE]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0N4RP0Z4TwE[/url]
[size=4]Server IP: maxcraft.biz:25560[/size]
[size=4][b]MaxCraft Introduction[/b][/size]
MaxCraft is a Minecraft multiplayer server with many features. Some of these features include: -Factions -Economy (Kill animals/monsters to gain money & sell/buy items in shop).You can also VOTE for FREE ITEMS /vote -Mini Games (Parkour,Spleef,Hunger Games,Paintball,Team PvP...) -PvP (You are able to switch your PvP to off and on)
There are also in-game buyable ranks,where you can upgrade your powers to the maximum. (To buy a rank type /payrank list)
[size=2]Rank List:[/size] DEFAULT Limit of homes:1 Colour name:NO Can use buckets:NO Can use ICE:YES Can use FIRE:NO Can use SPAWN EGGS:NO Can use REDSTONE:YES Can go to floating island:NO Can use FLY:NO
Tag:[Member] Cost:1500 $ Limit of homes:2 Colour name:YES Can use buckets:NO Can use ICE:YES Can use FIRE:NO Can use CHICKEN EGG:YES Can use REDSTONE:YES Can go to floating island:NO Can use FLY:NO
Tag:[Dedicated] Cost:3500 $ Limit of homes:3 Colour name:YES Can use buckets:WATER BUCKET Can use ICE:YES Can use FIRE:NO Can use CHICKEN,PIG EGG:YES Can use REDSTONE:YES Can go to floating island:NO Can use FLY:NO
Tag:[Professional] Cost:12 000 $ Limit of homes:4 Colour name:YES Can use buckets:WATER BUCKET Can use ICE:YES Can use FIRE:NO Can use CHICKEN,PIG,SHEEP EGG:YES Can use REDSTONE:YES Can go to floating island: NO Can use FLY:NO
Tag:[Event Winner] Cost:WIN AN EVENT (You must win event organized by server owner) Limit of homes:5 Colour name:YES Can use buckets:WATER BUCKET Can use ICE:YES Can use FIRE:NO Can use CHICKEN,PIG,SHEEP,COW EGG:YES Can use REDSTONE:YES Can go to floating island: NO Can use FLY:NO
[size=3]In-Game Commands[/size] To check money balance type /MONEY To protect your land or building use Factions /f help /home set AND THE NAME OF THE HOME THAT YOU WANT /home list TO CHECK LIST OF YOUR HOMES /home delete TO DELETE A HOME /listwarps TO CHECK LIST OF WARPS /warp AND THE NAME OF WARP TO GET TELEPORTED TO SPECIFIC WARP /pvp on TO TURN YOUR PVP STATUS ON /pvp off TO TURN YOUR PVP STATUS OFF /rtp [PLAYER] TO SEND TP REQUEST /rtp yes TO ACCEPT TP REQUEST /tell playername message (to whisper a person) Type /warp island to go to floating island [Donator Rank Only] Type /warp world to return to normal world Type /warp minigames to go to Mini Games --------------------- [b]MaxCraft was released in early 2012, and has prospered and grown in so many ways. The team consist of mature staff, to provide our community the most pleasureable experience a Minecraft Server can offer.[/b]
[b]EXTRA:[/b][size=3][/size] [size=2]TO GET 1.6.2 CRACKED LAUNCHER YOU WILL NEED: [url=http://web.maxcraft.biz/.minecraft.rar]http://web.maxcraft.biz/.minecraft.rar[/url] <-- .minecraft (NEEEDED WITH THIS LAUNCHER) [url=http://web.maxcraft.biz/crackedmc.exer]http://web.maxcraft.biz/crackedmc.exer[/url] <-- 1.6.2 CRACKED LAUNCHER TEXT INSTALLATION TUTORIAL: STEP 1: Download cracked LAUNCHER and .minecraft STEP 2: Delete everything in C:\Users\username\AppData\Roaming\.minecraft | OR TYPE SERACH FOR %APPDATA% go into Roaming and delete .minecraft there. STEP 3: Copy .minecraft from the rar and paste it into C:\Users\username\AppData\Roaming\ STEP 4: Place the 'Minecraft.exe on your desktop or task bar. STEP 5: Run the new launcher, enter the name you wish to use, and enjoy 1.6.2 INFORMATION: IF you are getting error "COULD NOT THE MAIN CLASS: NET.MINECRAFT.LAUNCHER" update your Java to the latest version.
MaxCraft Owner -Pacnik[/size]

The rank prices are just crazy.

[/quote]

Yes,that is in-game money since we have buyable ranks (with in-game money) aswell.

[size=4]Server IP: maxcraft.biz:25560[/size]

[size=4]MaxCraft Introduction[/size]

MaxCraft is a Minecraft multiplayer server with many features. Some of these features include:
-Factions
-Economy (Kill animals/monsters to gain money & sell/buy items in shop).You can also VOTE for FREE ITEMS /vote
-Mini Games (Parkour,Spleef,Hunger Games,Paintball,Team PvP…)
-PvP (You are able to switch your PvP to off and on)

There are also in-game buyable ranks,where you can upgrade your powers to the maximum.
(To buy a rank type /payrank list)

[size=3]In-Game Commands[/size]
To check money balance type /MONEY
To protect your land or building use Factions /f help
/home set AND THE NAME OF THE HOME THAT YOU WANT
/home list TO CHECK LIST OF YOUR HOMES
/home delete TO DELETE A HOME
/listwarps TO CHECK LIST OF WARPS
/warp AND THE NAME OF WARP TO GET TELEPORTED TO SPECIFIC WARP
/pvp on TO TURN YOUR PVP STATUS ON
/pvp off TO TURN YOUR PVP STATUS OFF
/rtp [PLAYER] TO SEND TP REQUEST
/rtp yes TO ACCEPT TP REQUEST
/tell playername message (to whisper a person)
Type /warp island to go to floating island [Donator Rank Only]
Type /warp world to return to normal world
Type /warp minigames to go to Mini Games

MaxCraft was released in early 2012, and has prospered and grown in so many ways. The team consist of mature staff, to provide our community the most pleasureable experience a Minecraft Server can offer.

STEP 3: Copy .minecraft from the rar and paste it into C:\Users\username\AppData\Roaming
STEP 4: Place the 'Minecraft.exe on your desktop or task bar.
STEP 5: Run the new launcher, enter the name you wish to use, and enjoy 1.6.2
INFORMATION: IF you are getting error “COULD NOT THE MAIN CLASS: NET.MINECRAFT.LAUNCHER” update your Java to the latest version.

MaxCraft Owner
-Pacnik[/size]
